experience.role_description: Complete installation of a 9MW, 4MW & 2MW electrical system which included the generator yard, all its components on a Cyrus One Data Hall build out by identifying, planning and supervising with robust strategies. Directed and supervised 45 electricians on the installation of Husky Cable Tray, 1000 kcmil, 2500KVA Medium Voltage Transformers and 2500KW Generators. Collaborated with a diverse team of mechanical and electrical engineers to ensure the proper installation of feeders & conduit routing inside Commercial Chillers.

Inspected and Tested Commercial Solar Skids during manufacturing and pre-fabrication process. Successfully approved quality control on over 30 Power Solar Skids with a 100% approval rating. Performed and Documented all 120V/480V testing on electrical equipment.

Successfully planned the layout and installation of electrical systems and components on over 25 commercial and industrial base build projects. Led a team of 25 workers for the daily execution of coordinated work activities in a manner that is consistent with OSHA Safety Standards.

education.description: 4 year Apprenticeship Program Accredited through the United States Department of Labor. Outstanding Academic Achievement Award. GPA 4.0

education.degree: Bachelor of Fine Arts: Film & TV Production
education.description: Emphasis in Cinematography. 4 years Accredited towards Degree
